tool.name: Augustus
tool.command:
## please set export AUGUSTUS_CONFIG_PATH=/path_to_augustus/augustus/config ## or use the --AUGUSTUS_CONFIG_PATH=path if you are not installing through the toolshed ## Augustus writes the protein and coding sequences as comment into the gff/gtf file an external script is used to extract the sequences into additional files
augustus --strand=$strand $noInFrameStop $gff
#if 'protein' in str($outputs).split(','): --protein=on #else: --protein=off #end if
#if 'codingseq' in str($outputs).split(','): --codingseq=on #else: --codingseq=off #end if
#if 'introns' in str($outputs).split(','): --introns=on #else: --introns=off #end if
#if 'start' in str($outputs).split(','): --start=on #else: --stop=off #end if
#if 'stop' in str($outputs).split(','): --stop=on #else: --stop=off #end if
#if 'cds' in str($outputs).split(','): --cds=on #else: --cds=off #end if
$singlestrand $input_genome $mea $utr --genemodel=$genemodel --species=$organism ##--outfile=$output | tee $output #if 'protein' in str($outputs).split(',') or 'codingseq' in str($outputs).split(','): | python \$AUGUSTUS_SCRIPT_PATH/extract_features.py #if 'protein' in str($outputs).split(','): --protein $protein_output #end if #if 'codingseq' in str($outputs).split(','): --codingseq $codingseq_output #end if #end if

param.name: noInFrameStop
param.label: Don't report transcripts with in-frame stop codons (--noInFrameStop)
param.help: Otherwise, intron-spanning stop codons could occur

param.name: singlestrand
param.label: Predict genes independently on each strand, allow overlapping genes on opposite strands (--singlestrand)

param.name: mea
param.label: Using the maximum expected accuracy approach (--mea)
param.help: MEA is an alternative decoding approach.

param.name: utr
param.label: Predict the untranslated regions in addition to the coding sequence (--UTR)
param.help: This currently works only for human, galdieria, toxoplasma and caenorhabditis.

param.name: strand
param.help: Report predicted genes on both strands, just the forward or just the backward strand.

param.name: genemodel
param.label: Gene Model
param.help: Gene Model to predict, for more information please refere to the help.

param.name: gff
param.label: GFF formated output, standard is GTF (--gff3)

param.name: outputs
param.label: Output options
param.option: coding sequence as comment in the output file (--codingseq)

validator.message: Please select at least one output file.
